Instruction: Peel the sweet potatoes and cut them into thin fries.
In a large bowl, toss the sweet potato fries with olive oil, salt, black pepper, and paprika until evenly coated.
Spread the fries in a single layer on a baking sheet.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, flipping halfway through, until the fries are crispy and golden brown.
Remove from the oven and serve hot as a delicious side dish.
